mapper.insert:
insert into tunesurge_users.ts_menu(code, p_id, menu_name, url, is_menu, level, sort, status, icon, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.pId}, #{entity.menuName}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.isMenu}, #{entity.level}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into tunesurge_users.ts_menu(code, p_id, menu_name, url, is_menu, level, sort, status, icon, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.pId}, #{entity.menuName}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.isMenu}, #{entity.level}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update code = values(code) , p_id = values(p_id) , menu_name = values(menu_name) , url = values(url) , is_menu = values(is_menu) , level = values(level) , sort = values(sort) , status = values(status) , icon = values(icon) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
